00208   void resize(unsigned d0, unsigned d1, unsigned d2, int dummy=0){ 
00209     unsigned i,j;
00210     A.resize(d0,d1,d2,false);
00211     P1.resize(d0,d1,false);

00216     }
00217   }

00538   ArrayTable<T>& operator =(const ArrayTable<T>& a){
00539     if(a.A.ndim()==3) resize(a.A.dim(0),a.A.dim(1),a.A.dim(2),false);
00540     else{
00541       if(a.A.ndim()==2) resize(a.A.dim(0),a.A.dim(1),false);
00542       else if(a.A.ndim()==1) resize(a.A.dim(0),false);
00543     }

00545     return *this;
